content:
We have a handful of definitions that help work with the tensor product of an algebra and a module, but many of these are not as heterogenous as they could be, and others are only available heterogeneously. #6035 fills in the majority of this gap, and is blocking some follow-up work in the tensor product of an algebra and another algebra (which ultimately, is a tool that I want to use for the base change of bilinear forms).

Kevin Buzzard has already reviewed; could someone else take a look?
#6417 is the follow-up for tensor products of algebras
